bio:
Valdar was a Nord warrior. He died inside Valthume and his skeleton and ghost can still be found there.
Valdar locked Hevnoraak inside Valthume and kept him there for many generations, but his strength is fading. He is the quest-giver of the quest "Evil in Waiting."
name: Valdar
notes: Shawn - not started. Potentially not interactable. Download the MaleGhost voice model via the link in the #voice-models Discord channel. It's a Skyrim-ified version of the MaleAltmer_Bosmer_Dunmer_GSaint voice model from Oblivion. It's not a perfect match, but it's the same VA: Craig Sechler
